definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: I've recently started to crew for a sailboat and occasionally take part in offshore races.
sentences.chinese: 我最近開始組建一支帆船隊，並偶爾參加近海比賽。

sentences.english: It may be necessary to relocate people who were living too close to the shore.
sentences.chinese: 可能有必要重新安置那些過於靠近海岸生活的人口。

sentences.english: Seabro family hotel is located at the 3th floor of 'Fengzheng Lianyashe' building.
sentences.chinese: 右近海太郎家庭旅館是位於風箏戀雅舍的第三層。

sentences.english: Yellow Sea coastal waters of the thermocline is the strongest and weakest areas halocline.
sentences.chinese: 黃海是中國近海溫躍層最強而鹽躍層最弱的區域。

sentences.english: The government is allowing the areas of inshore coastal waters to be explored for oil and gas.
sentences.chinese: 當局允許在近海海域勘探石油和天然氣。

sentences.english: The paper reviews development status of abroad offshore wind farm briefly and the key technology related with offshore wind farm.
sentences.chinese: 與陸上風電場相比，近海風電場建設的技術難度較大。

sentences.english: Warm weather has attracted the flat fish close to shore .
sentences.chinese: 煦暖的氣候將比目魚引到了近海。

sentences.english: Try to avoid eating raw river fish or seafood, or river fish/seafood from just offshore;
sentences.chinese: 儘量避免喫生河魚或海鮮或近海地區的海產品。

sentences.english: Secondly, the article analyzed and established the scope of the inshore battles.
sentences.chinese: 其次分析確立了近海防禦戰略戰場的範圍。

sentences.english: The state shall encourage and support the development of offshore and deep sea fisheries and make rational arrangement of fishing capacity for inland and inshore fisheries.
sentences.chinese: 合理安排內水和近海捕撈力量。

sentences.english: A big program of oil exploration has begun offshore.
sentences.chinese: 一個大規模的石油勘探計劃正在近海展開。

sentences.english: There are new problems on the horizon, just beyond those oil platforms offshore.
sentences.chinese: 就在近海區石油鑽井平臺之外，新的問題已初露端倪。

sentences.english: Most current marine fish farms are in shallow, near-shore waters.
sentences.chinese: 目前，大多數海洋魚類養殖場都位於近海淺灘。

sentences.english: A two-dimensional horizontal model is employed for numerical studies of storm-induced currents in coastal seas.
sentences.chinese: 用一個水平二維模式對近海風暴流進行數值研究。

sentences.english: Seismometers could give us a better idea about the offshore earthquake threat.
sentences.chinese: 地震儀可以讓我們更好地瞭解有關近海地震的威脅。

sentences.english: These switches are ideal for use in Off-shore Exploration and Petro-chemical processing.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於近海開發和石油化學加工。

definition: shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
dry land (as opposed to the sea)
